page.title: 10INTERESTING PEOPLE
page.content: {An interview with my Grandmother My Grandmother has lived in Deganwy all her life and has seen these changes.Our Deganwy school used to be opposite the All Saints Hall but that building is now the Sea Cadets headquaters.Our school was built where a field used to be.Behind Bethal Chapel on Pentywyn Road was a field with a stream running through it where tadpoles and newts could be caught,now Bungalows have been built there.Some houses next to the Maggie Murphys Pub have been pulled down to make a carpark.On Deganwy beach was a landing stage where years ago a Paddle Steamer called to take passengers up the Conwy River to Trefriw and Tal Y Cafn. It would then stop and allow people off to have teas and enjoy themselves.
